response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value and significance, worth $1,500,000 to you, and we believe it would greatly enhance your collection or business. We are offering this extraordinary piece to you at a special introductory price of $1,250,000. This is a unique chance to secure a valuable asset at a highly competitive rate.

Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We are confident that you will find this product to be an exceptional investment. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1250000}
